      • eventsArePair

        public boolean eventsArePair(BuckEvent event)
        Specified by:
        eventsArePair in interface BuckEvent
        Overrides:
        eventsArePair in class LogEvent
        Returns:
        Whether or not this event is a pair of another event. Events that are pairs if they pertain to the same event, for example if they are measuring the start and stop of some phase. For example, 
           
    (CommandEvent.started("build")).eventsArePair(CommandEvent.finished("build")) == true
    (CommandEvent.started("build")).eventsArePair(CommandEvent.started("build")) == true
    (CommandEvent.started("build")).eventsArePair(CommandEvent.finished("install")) == false
        This should be used to pair start events to finished events.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class LogEvent
